## TileDataAccessor.(constructor)

Constructs a `TileDataAccessor` instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(tile: Tile, visitor: ITileDataVisitor, options: TileDataAccessorOptions);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tile | [Tile](./harp-mapview.tile.md) | The tile to access. |
|  visitor | [ITileDataVisitor](./harp-mapview.itiledatavisitor.md) | The visitor. |
|  options | [TileDataAccessorOptions](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessoroptions.md) | Options for the tile. |
